activities:
We have opened a new company in the United States which provides web hosting services on USA based computer systems.

Our "other" company is Sub 6 Limited which provides web hosting services on UK based computer systems. Our company registration (England & Wales) number is 04439133 and our data protection and register number is Z8853138.

We now would like our USA company to adhere to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.

With regard to the question "Which EU/EEA Countries do you receive information from?" it is possible that we can have customers from any of these countries.
